resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73504</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73504</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660d-ec78-4577-2a4c-0f458312b32d#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Női pántkarperecek, Magyar Nemzeti Múzeum, Budapest, ezüst, dombormű.</string>
            <string language="en">woman hinge-bracelet, Hungarian National Museum, Budapest, silver, embossment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frau Scharnier-Hinge-bracelet, ungarisches 
nationales Museum, Budapest, Silber, Prägung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">charnière-bracelet de femme, musée national 
hongrois, Budapest, argent, foulage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dobradiça-hinge-bracelet da mulher, museu 
nacional hungarian, Budapest, prata, embossment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cerniera-hinge-bracelet della donna, museo 
nazionale ungherese, Budapest, argento, embossment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άρθρωση-βραχιόλι γυναικών, ουγγρικό εθνικό μουσείο, 
Βουδαπέστη, ασήμι, embossment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bisagra-pulsera de la mujer, museo nacional 
húngaro, Budapest, plata, repujado</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Honfoglalás kori régészeti leleteink számos női ékszert tartalmaztak. Ezek között több pántkarperecet is találtak.</string>
            <string language="en">Our archeological findings from Conquest era contained numerous woman jewels. 
Several hinge-bracelets had founded among these findings. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">karperec,  női viselet,  ötvösmunka,  </string>
            <string language="en">bracelet, woman wearing, goldsmith's work</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unsere archäologischen Entdeckungen von der 
Eroberungära enthielten zahlreiche Fraujuwelen. Einige 
Scharnier-Hinge-bracelets hatten unter diesen Entdeckungen gegründet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nos résultats archéologiques d'ère de conquête
ont contenu de nombreux bijoux de femme. Plusieurs 
charnière-bracelets avaient fondé parmi ces résultats.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nossos findings archeological da era do conquest 
contiveram jóias numerosas da mulher. Diversos 
dobradiça-hinge-bracelets tinham fundado entre estes findings.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I nostri risultati archeological dall'era di 
conquista hanno contenuto i gioielli numerosi della donna. 
Parecchi cerniera-hinge-bracelets avevano fondato fra questi 
risultati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα archeological συμπεράσματά μας από την εποχή 
κατάκτησης περιείχαν τα πολυάριθμα κοσμήματα γυναικών. 
Διάφορα άρθρωση-βραχιόλια είχαν ιδρύσει μεταξύ αυτών των 
συμπερασμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nuestros resultados arqueológicos a partir de la 
era de la conquista contuvieron las joyas numerosas de la mujer. 
Varias bisagra-pulseras habían fundado entre estos resultados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bracelet, tragende Frau, Arbeit des Goldschmieds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bracelet, femme portant, le travail de l'orfèvre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bracelet, mulher que desgasta, trabalho do goldsmith</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bracelet, donna che porta, lavoro dell'orafo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βραχιόλι, γυναίκα που φορά, εργασία του χρυσοχόου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pulsera, mujer que desgasta, trabajo del orfebre</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73504</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=40b2660d-ec78-4577-2a4c-0f458312b32d&v=1&b=3</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
